alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Pike (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 19 at 4:21AM CDT until March 21 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CDT MONDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT ON TUESDAY FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM CDT... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 possible. * WHERE...Pike and Barbour Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 10 AM CDT Monday. For the Freeze Watch, on Tuesday from 1 AM to 8 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
